activities.name: API GET CNT
activities.description: API의 총 건 수를 확인하기 위해 API 1회 호출.

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API INDEX 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서INDEX 번호를 읽어옵니다.

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);

activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

activities.description: API의 총 건 수를 확인하기 위해 API 1회 호출.

activities.name: API GET CNT

query.value:
select a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,',') as inculde_keyword
      ,a.exculde_keyword 
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,'||') as api_inculde_keyword
      ,replace(a.exculde_keyword ,',','||') as api_exculde_keyword
  from (
		select gubun   
		      ,reason 
		      ,keyword		    
		      ,exculde_keyword 
		      ,case when regexp_match( inculde_keyword,',') is not null then '('||replace(inculde_keyword,',','&&')||')'
		            else inculde_keyword
		        end inculde_keyword         
		  from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_keyword
       ) a              
group by  a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword  
       ,a.exculde_keyword 
order by a.gubun, a.reason, a.keyword

delete from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}';


insert into cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data
(
 "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,inculde_keyword
	,exculde_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
)
select "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,inculde_keyword
	,exculde_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
 from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data_temp
 where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}';

select 1 as su;
select cd_mart.func_dm_fm_association_frequency();
select cd_mart.func_dm_kr_ap_use_summary();
select cd_mart.func_dm_pt_home_data();

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

select to_char(min(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS SDATE
         ,to_char(MAX(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS EDATE
    from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst
   where CMONTH2 between to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
   GROUP BY CMONTH2
   ORDER BY CMONTH2

SELECT *
 FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE
    FROM CD_ODS.POS_DD_SALES
    WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN  '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DWRS.SC_EVENT_PLAN_COMPLETE
 WHERE EVENT_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND EVENT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DWRS.SC_EVENT_PLAN_COMPLETE
 WHERE EVENT_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND EVENT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

query.value:
select distinct pg_table_name as  pg_table_name      
      ,es_table_name      
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_upsert() as rtn;
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_truncate_temp() as rtn;
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_truncate_temp() as rtn;

activities.name: table_list
activities.description: 정웝이샵 테이블과 적재되는 pg테이블 리스트 ( temp )

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_upsert() as rtn;

activities.name: condition
activities.description:
초기 적재 파이프라인 PIP_D_CD_GODOMALL_INIT 호출시 
증분주기값 넘어옴

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)
where @{variables('condition')}

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_upsert() as rtn;
select cd_ods.func_godomoall_truncate_temp() as rtn;

activities.name: table_list

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)  
where a.es_table_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.pip_estable}'

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a
